About Furnterra

Crafting exceptional furniture that transforms your house into a home

Our Story

Founded in 2018, Furnterra began as a passion project to bring handcrafted, quality furniture to homes across the country. We believe that furniture is more than just functional pieces ‚Äì it's about creating spaces that reflect your personality and enhance your daily life.

From our humble beginnings in a small workshop to becoming a trusted name in home furnishing, we've maintained our commitment to exceptional craftsmanship, sustainable practices, and customer satisfaction.

Today, we're proud to serve thousands of customers who trust us to help them create beautiful, comfortable living spaces that truly feel like home.

Our Journey

Key milestones in our growth and development

2018

Company Founded

Furnterra was established with a vision to transform homes through quality furniture.

2020

Online Launch

Expanded our reach with our e-commerce platform, making quality furniture accessible nationwide.

2022

Sustainable Materials

Committed to using 100% sustainable and eco-friendly materials in all our products.

2024

50,000+ Happy Customers

Reached a milestone of serving over 50,000 satisfied customers across the country.
